alert.note: Alert for Barbour; Northwest Pocahontas; Northwest Randolph; Southeast Pocahontas; Southeast Randolph; Southeast Webster; Upshur (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 14 at 3:12AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...Gusty showers will impact portions of Randolph, Pocahontas, southeastern Upshur, southeastern Webster and eastern Barbour Counties through 400 AM EDT... At 311 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of gusty showers extending from 11 miles south of Newburg to 6 miles northeast of Richwood. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Elkins, Marlinton, Cass Scenic Railroad, Greenbank, Belington, Mill Creek, Snowshoe, Dailey, Mingo, Beverly, Junior, Durbin, Hillsboro, Womelsdorf (Coalton), Huttonsville, Montrose, Harman, Pheasant Run, Arbovale and Cheat Bridge. This includes Route 33 between mile markers 31 and 35. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Barbour; Northwest Pocahontas; Northwest Randolph; Southeast Pocahontas; Southeast Randolph; Southeast Webster; Upshur
